author: wsmoak
msg: Merge changes from the Core 1.1.4 release branch.
Add config for the jar plugin to generate manifest entries, and set the version number to 2.1 to avoid surprises.
Remove the <repository> entry for the staging repo on the zone, nothing from there is needed.
Fix the <id> of the snapshot repo to avoid duplicate requests.
